mapper.select: select * from aa10 where aaa104 = 0 and aaa100 = 'CSY042' and aaa103 = #{csy042}
select * from aa10 where aaa104 = 0 and aaa100 = 'CSY043' and aaa103 = #{csy043}
select aaa102, aaa103 from aa10 where aaa104 = 0 and aaa100 = 'CSY042'
select aaa102, aaa103 from aa10 where aaa104 = 0 and aaa100 = 'CSY043' and aaa105 = #{aaa105}
mapper.insert: insert into aa10 (AAA100, AAA102, AAA101, AAA103) values (#{aaa100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aaa102,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aaa101,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aaa103,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
